mapper.insert: insert into Member3 (Midx, Mid, Mpwd, Mname, Mmail, Mphone, Mpost, Maddr1, Maddr2) values(seq_Midx.NEXTVAL,#{mid}, #{mpwd}, #{mname}, #{mmail}, #{mphone},#{mpost},#{maddr1},#{maddr2})
mapper.select: select Midx, Mid, Mpwd from Member3 where Mid=#{mid} and Mpwd=#{mpwd}
mapper.update: update Member3 set Mpwd=#{mpwd}, Mmail=#{mmail}, Mphone=#{mphone}, Mpost=#{mpost}, Maddr1=#{maddr1}, Maddr2=#{maddr2}, Mmday=sysdate where Midx=#{midx}
